Tracking¶

class scripts.tracking.Tracking[source]¶

Tracking Class

initialize()[source]¶

Create reference path or trajectory. Create Robot object. Create Initial Plot. Create Controller (tracker).

run()[source]¶

Start tracking

final()[source]¶

This function calculates and reports errors, and then plots the final trajectory.

results()[source]¶

processing and saving path tracking results. Calculate error.
